channel.title: Brandon Reads
channel.description: Greetings! Please join me as I share my journey of discovery, reflection, and growth as a volunteer reader for LibriVox. Through stories, commentary, and practical tips gleaned from my own experiences, each episode offers a glimpse into the joys and challenges that arise from immersing oneself in the timeless tales of the past.
channel.itunes:author: Brandon Brinkley

item.title: So It Begins...
item.description: They say that a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. This is my first adventure in the realm of podcasting. In this episode I explain how I got started with Librivox and what value I hope to bring to you in this podcast.

item.title: The Era of Discovery (Librivox)
item.description: This is a short recording I made in early 2024. It's a summary of early European exploration in North America taken from the Lectures on the Harvard Classics. I have included it here as a bonus episode as an example of what a typical Librivox recording sounds like.
